numSensor.label: CW Setpoint to start CW Operating Mode (Only TC Units)

Delta Temperature for Automatic Mean/Local Changeover
Power Supply Fail.(UCAP on working) Time

stateSensor.label: Room Temperature And Humidity Limits by External Sensors
CW Temperature too High for Dehumidification
CW Valve Failure or Water Flow too Low
Air Conditioning Unit Exceeded Runtime Threshold
humidifier: bottle full of water alarm (lock)
cw temperature too high for dehumidification (circ 2)
dual coil: expansion board not connected
mode cw+dx: hour counter threshold alarm
mode dx: hour counter threshold alarm
mode cw: hour counter threshold alarm
stand-by mode: hour counter threshold alarm
